about.title: About me
about.description1: My name is Kilian Armas PÃ©rez, and I am a Computer Engineering student at the University of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. I am currently about to enter the last year of the degree.
about.description2: I am passionate about web development and programming in general. I like to learn new things and keep up to date with the latest technologies. I am always looking for new projects to work on and learn.
